alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Phelps, northwestern Kearney, western Buffalo, northeastern Gosper and Dawson Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1030 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eddyville to near Lexington to near Johnson Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lexington and Eddyville around 1035 PM CDT. Sumner around 1045 PM CDT. Overton around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Miller, Elm Creek, Amherst, Odessa, Kearney, Pleasanton and Riverdale. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 225 and 276. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
